SENT.plain: 28978 autopsy reports of young (after the 14th year of age) and adult patients autopsied during the period from 1.1 1951 until 31
12 1969 were scored for atherosclerotic changes of the aorta and the large arteries
The informations were transferred to punched cards and processed with electronic data equipment
The methods of the statistical evaluation are described
52.96 per cent of the cases revealed an aortic atherosclerosis
17.96 per cent showed an atherosclerosis of the cerebral arteries, 31.16 per cent of the cases had atherosclerotic changes of the kidneys
All groups of diseases showed an increase during the observation period
